title: Case 1
description: The law of the Ukrainian Central Rada and the recall of the Jewish parties "Bund", "Poalei-Zion", etc. to the population about national and personal autonomy. Copies of circulars of the General Secretariat of Internal Affairs on the establishment of the General Secretariat for Jewish Affairs. Notice of the Information Bureau on the meeting of the Provisional Jewish National Council and its resolutions on negotiations with the Government of Romania, 06.10.1917-26.11.1917, 25 sheets.

title: Case 2
description: Draft regulation of the General Secretariat for Jewish Affairs on the Kyiv Jewish Teachers' Seminary, text with amendments to the general provisions on the Jewish National Union, draft [declaration] of a comrade of the General Secretary for Jewish Affairs on the establishment of a national union and autonomy, 15 sheets.

title: Case 3
description: Draft instructions on the appointment of comrades of the General Secretary for national affairs and their functions, 07/15/1917-09/01/1917, 16 sheets.

title: Case 4
description: Certificates of persons who submitted applications for enlistment in the Ukrainian army, place of residence, etc.; information about the location in Kyiv of the Regional Committee of the Jewish party "Yiddish Volkspartel" and its publishing house "Volksforlag", 03.11.1917-08.03.1918, 20 sheets.

title: Case 5
description: Copies of certificates issued to employees of the General Secretariat for Jewish Affairs, 10.12.1917-31.12.1917, 23 sheets.

title: Case 6
description: Notice of the General Secretary for Jewish Affairs and residents of the localities annexed to Romania and the Chernihiv province about the pogroms, October 19, 1917-April 8, 1918, 4 sheets.

title: Case 7
description: Statistical information of trustees of educational districts on the number of the Jewish population in the provinces of Ukraine and school-age children on January 1, 1917 (drafts); lists of Jewish schools, 12 sheets.

title: Case 8
description: Minutes of meetings and resolutions of the Provisional National Assembly, 03.11.1917-05.11.1917, 63 sheets.

title: Case 9
description: Minutes of meetings of the General Secretariat of the Ukrainian SSR (Council of People's Ministers of the Ukrainian SSR), September 3, 1917-April 17, 1918, 179 sheets.

title: Case 10
description: Minutes of the meetings of the commission under the General Secretariat of International Affairs, the draft law on the departure of Galicians and Bukovinians to their homeland, who are in the territory of Ukraine as exiles and refugees after the World War, 13 sheets.

title: Case 11
description: Protocols of meetings of the Jewish population and meetings of the commission for the organization of elections to the Jewish community, Art. Bakhmach and the list of elected officials, 11/12/1917-07/1918, 7 sheets.
